Class TransactionGroup

java.lang.Object
ca.yorku.cmg.cnsim.engine.transaction.TransactionGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITxContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Block, TransactionWorkload
public class TransactionGroup extends Object implements ITxContainer
A list containing various transactions. Can be used as a block or other needed grouping (e.g. pool).
Author:
Sotirios Liaskos for the Enterprise Systems Group @ York University

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionGroup

      public TransactionGroup()
      Plain constructor, simply initializes the internal data structure.

    • TransactionGroup

      public TransactionGroup(List<Transaction> initial)
      Accepts an already created ArrayList of transactions. Calculates the total value and size in the group.
      Parameters:
      initial - An already created ArrayList of transactions

    • TransactionGroup

      public TransactionGroup(String fileName, boolean hasHeader) throws IOException
      Loads a transaction group from a text file. Each line in the file is a separate transaction. Each transaction is a comma separated string containing the following information: Transaction ID, Time Created, Total Value, Total Size, First Arrival NodeID. Transaction ID must run from 1 to n strictly increasing by 1 at each step (error otherwise). Time must not decrease as transactions IDs increase. Time Created: a long integer representing the number of milliseconds (ms) from a fixed time 0. Total Value: in user defined tokens depending on network. TODO: Is this bytes? Total Size: in bytes First Arrival NodeID: the node at which the transaction first arrives
      Parameters:
      fileName - A name to the text file containing the transactions.
      hasHeader - Whether the file has a header.
      Throws:
      IOException - Error finding or reading the file.

      public void updateTransactionGroup(List<Transaction> initial)
      Replace transaction group with a new one.
      Parameters:
      initial - An array list of Transaction objects, to replace the existing one.

    • overlapsWithByObj

      public boolean overlapsWithByObj(TransactionGroup p)
      Check if the group overlaps with another transaction group, i.e., there is a transaction in p that also exists in the current group.
      Parameters:
      p - The TransactionGroup in question.
      Returns:
      true of there is at least one transaction in p that is contained in the group, false, otherwise.

    • overlapsWith

      public boolean overlapsWith(TransactionGroup g)
      As overlapsWithByObj(TransactionGroup) but criterion that is used is transaction ID.
      Parameters:
      g - The TransactionGroup object in question.
      Returns:
      true of there is at least one transaction in g that is contained in the group, false, otherwise.

    • getTopN

      public TransactionGroup getTopN(float sizeLimit, Comparator<Transaction> comp)
      Retrieves a TransactionGroup containing the top N transactions based on a given size limit and comparator.
      Parameters:
      sizeLimit - The maximum cumulative size (in bytes) of transactions allowed in the result.
      comp - The comparator used to sort the transactions.
      Returns:
      A TransactionGroup object containing the top N transactions that do not exceed sizeLimit based on given comparator.

      public Transaction getTransaction(int index)

      Parameters:

      public String debugPrintPoolTx()
